title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K. 9/30/33, V. & S. 10/17/33, NOTE: STRAIGHT STRIPE WALNUT & HIGHLY FIG. BUTT WALNUT (orange pencil)/ASPEN (crossed out) TOPS & FRONTS-MAPLE SOLID PARTS/OAK INTERIORS.; lower left in orange color pencil: V. & S. # 2020; upper right in orange color pencil: DIN- A 5; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"=1'0"/#/7515 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions and materials in graphite; erased inscriptions at upper center
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Rounded front edges with two side cabinets and three stacked drawers. Four legs are squared and tapered. Darker wood on body and top of table, and lighter wood on side cabinets. Pulls on cabinet doors are circular ivory disks on polished chrome base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-919.
